branchCategory.name: M(D)B1-Z, Square Tube, Double Acting, Single Rod, Standard
branchCategory.description: The MB1 single rod, double acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. The MB1 utilizes a profile tube that enclose the tie rods. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. Also available with a rubber end of stroke cushion instead of air cushion.

breadCrumb.name: M(D)B1-Z, Square Tube, Double Acting, Single Rod, Standard
